Speakers lineup & presentations

  • Android piracy: I smell a RAT by Marko Belzetski - Clarified Security (slides and demo)
  • Cybersecurity in Military Systems by Tarmo Aia - Telecommunication Specialist at TalTech, consulting cyber-engineer at the Estonian Defense Forces (slides)
  • The best practices in iOS development to avoid vulnerabilities by Mari-Liis Sillat - iOS developer at Mooncascade (slides)
  • Hack my Sat: operations in a congested space and contested cyberspace Keynote (TBA) by Luca del Monte - European Space Agency (slides)
  • Experiences in browser bug farming by Aki Helin - Solita Oy
  • Owning web apps through CORS misconfiguration by Niklas Särökaari - Silverskin
  • Communication solution based on end-to-end hardware encryption by Stefano Alberico - Crip.to
  • Only an Electron away from code execution by Silvia Väli - Clarified Security
  • Stories from a bugbounty program by Joakim Tauren - Visma
  • DevSec by Antti Virtanen - Solita Oy
  • WAN-to-LAN exploitation of 4G broadband modem by Iiro Uusitalo - Solita Oy
  • Database Hoarding. For fun and profit by Shamil Alifov
